attributes.action: ensure that employers are made to pay employees who work Saturday/Sunday/Bank Holidays at least 1.5 times their usual pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our country is probably the only one that has encouraged Bank Holiday working for employees but it fails the employee who works for normal pay.
This also is true of employers who pay workers single time for weekend working.
Surely the weekend is a valuable part of the week especially for parents with children so is a Bank Holiday, maybe if employers were made to pay reasonable rates for this there would be a decrease in the ammount of people working giving more quality time for all.
Maybe the benefits of this could even bring better community spirit and less boredom for children keeping them away from crime.
The cultures on the continent are still respected fully and the benefits are clear for all to see.
Saturday is worth at least pay + half.
Sunday at least double pay.
Bamk holidays at least Double time + day in lieu.(Treble time).
